item.title: US Employment Costs Cool In Third Quarter, Reflecting Job Market Weakness
item.description: The Employment Cost Index rose 0.8% in the quarter ended September 2025 compared to 0.9% in the previous quarter.

item.title: Silver Price Surges To Fresh Highs Ahead Of Fed Decision Later Today
item.description: Spot silver surged to $61.6 per ounce ahead of the Fed’s expected rate cut, while March 2026 futures traded at $60.46.

item.title: Drone Maker AeroVironment Stock Declines 8% After Q2 Profit Miss – Cantor Fitzgerald Believes Near-Term Pullback May Be Brief
item.description: The company reported adjusted earnings of $0.44 per share, below Wall Street’s estimate of $0.79 per share, according to Fiscal.ai data.

item.title: MSTR Calls MSCI’s 50% Threshold For DATs ‘Discriminatory, Arbitrary, Unworkable’ — Urges Inclusion Of Bitcoin-Focused Firms
item.description: In a letter to MSCI, the company argued that such a rule mischaracterizes its business.

item.title: Why Did ENVB Stock More Than Double In Value Today?
item.description: The company received a Notice of Allowance from the United States Patent and Trademark Office for its patent application.
